Translations.Text: (Zhe shi) yi zhang jing, wo jiang shi ta, bing yi ta wei dingzhi, qie zai qizhong jiang shi xuduo mingxian de jixiang, yibian nimen jiyi
Yin fu he jian fu, nimen yingdang ge da yibai bian. Nimen buyao wei lianmin ta lia er jianmian an la de xingfa, ruguo nimen quexin an la he wei ri. Jiao yi huo xinshi, jianshi ta lia de shouxing
Jian fu zhide qu yin fu, huo qu duoshenjiao tu; yin fu zhide jia jian fu, huo jia duoshenjiao tu, xindao zhe bude qu ta
Fan gaofa zhenjie de funu, er buneng ju chu si ge nanzi wei jianzheng zhe, nimen yingdang ba mei geren da bashi bian, bingqie yongyuan buke jieshou tamen de jianzheng. Zhe deng ren shi zuiren
Yihou huiguo zi xin zhe chuwai, yin wei an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Fan gaofa ziji de qizi, chu benren wai bie wu jianzheng, ta de zhengju shi zhi an la fashi si ci, zhengming ta que shi shuo shihua de
di wu ci shi shuo: Ta ganshou an la de zuzhou, ruguo ta shuohuangyan
Ta yao bimian xingfa, bixu zhi an la fashi si ci, zhengming ta que shi shuo huangyan de
di wu ci shi shuo:“Ta ganshou tianqian, ruguo ta shi shuo shihua de.”
Jiaruo wu an la suo ci nimen de enhui he renci, ruguo an la bushi zhi she de, bushi zhi rui de……
